N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2601.4 - One-third match

State Regulations
(a) The
applicant must demonstrate its access to matching support equal to at least one
third of the funds requested. (b) The required match may be cash and/or in-kind contributions, and must be used
for neighborhood preservation activities. (c) (1)

In-kind consists of goods and services provided to the applicant for which
payment is not required. In-kind contributions must be verifiable, quantifiable, reasonable and relevant to the organization's neighborhood
preservation activities. (2)

In-kind may not include: (i) routine board
functions and responsibilities; but may include, with DHCR approval, services
from board members for which the organization ordinarily would have to
pay; (ii)
overtime by executive and
full-time administrative staff paid with NPC funds; (iii)
technical assistance provided by
division staff; or
(iv)
any other
category determined by the division. (d) Documentation of in-kind contributions
must be available for review by division staff. Notes
